title: Mobile Microlearning Design Integrating Emotional Elements: A Study on Language Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience and practical application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical application competencies through project-based assessments in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Thematic emotion elements (character/theme-specific colors) in learning materials improve knowledge retention rates by over 20%.
The transfer learning effect of context-linked emotion elements exceeds that of general emotion elements (colors, emojis) by at least 15%.
The integration of emotion elements maintains learner satisfaction and lecture immersion at 4.0 or higher on a 5-point scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
